title: Skins, skins everywhere v 2.0
body:
SO. I was that guy who made this thread 
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=375930
LONG LONG TIME AGO OH SHIT SO MUCH TIME HAS PASSED from that day u can't even imagine what things I was through.

And now I am reloading this thread here (since I can't post and refresh that old thread any more).
I will post here old skins Ideas and sometimes I will try use my imagination fro some other new ones (after I finish my Art for Rito art contest).

replies.body: I'm drowning. Don't send help.
BaconHawk drowning in da skins and lovin it :3
U drowning in delicious tears of joy I PRESUME? /glare
Hire this man, let him design to his heart's content, and i'll proceed to politely ask rito to "SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY!!"

**LAWFUL. GOOD. VEIGAR.**

Riot, please!

i see no jinx skins

downvote

jk
That was long time ago. when I will have time from work. I will drew skins for all new champion that was released from the time I stoped drawing skin ideas. Fear not citizen.
can u make a sauron eye vel'koz like from lotr if its not too much trouble

oh god some of these are fantastic!

keep it up!

are the ideas yours, or are they based on suggestions?

90% is completelly my ideas, but some of them based on some random words from the internets (like the Reverse Annie was suggested long time ago before it was released by Riots on their forums. But no one drew it, so I did, and other skins which was suggested by some guy who sand me a letter via e-mail and land some really cool Ideas - I marked those)

I pretty much love almost all of these (except the "coming out ezreal" and the sissy Veigar; cause common dude?) but don't some of these seem a little ... illegal to do. I'd love Star Wars theme. And Transformers. And your love for Teemo brings me hope for Teemo's future of non-hate (roll with me here). Though that Tooth Fairy skin makes me wonder...

Woah. Lol. Dude it's just a random concepts. Don't be like this. I understand ur irrational fears about non-canon views of canon things, but it is really just for fun - Coming out Ezreal was the most funny skin for people who was commenting my old thread, they just though it was a humor, and it actually was just a humor). /wink

About illegal - I didn't understood that when I created the thread while drawing the ideas, so yeah some of the skins can be made with a 50% tweak to any side from the original some of the skins can't be made at all. I'm agree with this. It's not a big deal. Rito already made some of those.
:I sorry, i take too many things seriously
{{champion:24}} My Spoon is TOO Big!
there is no spoon
Great ideas man. Anything for Leona or Diana?
Those concepts were made that time when there wasn't any Diana or Leona. If I will find a time for new concepts, I will draw skins for new champions.
Ah, okay; no hurry, just wanted to know if you had any lying around.
Funny that a few have actually been made. Glacial Malphite, monk udyr, reverse and winter Annie.
Yeah. and actually that made me happy and some kind of proud.

That bigbrother blitzcrank skin is probably my favorite of the bunch ( It should be called Mr. Bubbles Blitzcrank )
If that skin were to be released I would honestly buy that in heartbeat.
These are so cute and funny! <3

OHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH PASTA JAX!
I love you man.
It's like the best skin I have ever seen in my lifespan.
Cheers.
Gonna eat some pasta later.

Malzahar needs a need skin with new particles. The DBZ one would be pretty cool, or if I have any Naruto fans here, how about Gaara? Sand particles and use Shukaku for his voidling. That would be epic
Do you want my skin? It's yellow.

Awesome concepts, cute art, and I like the presentation overall, but...

"Coming Out Ezreal"? That's a pretty problematic name, combined with the caricature drag outfit.

Yaaaassss, trainsformers for liiife, its funny b/c you put bump stopper poppy right infront of trainformer Mordekaiser.
now we just need a vel koz skin
The Reverse Teemo needs to be a thing. I don't care how many skins he has. He needs to have a Reverse Teemo skin.
HOW DID I NOT KNOW ABOUT THE ORIGINAL THREAD, these are great btw <3
Great ideas. I'd throw money at a Super Saiyan Malz skin
me too as well as the hobbit teemo
Just one thing you know amumu is a guy, right?

No one checking that (lul)
Yeah I know. But that wasn't reason enough in those days.
It's just an Idea though.
I like teen titans kennen
The "IRON" man blitz is a must. walking around as a heating iron would be awesome pulling ppl with my 3 prong drop cord

guys, I have an idea that maybe some people will like or some no. Im talking about riot Braum. like , rito plz, braum with a riot shield and some cool glasses with his mustache he would look sick. im gonna do a 3D version. (sorry for my english im french ^^) {{champion:201}}  and i think braum needs skins
Amazing

**Manly Taric.**

There's nothing else to say.
So much win. Geisha Akali? Nun Soraka? TAKE MY MONEY!
here is a thread with a person who drew different skins... i have not seen him post since... sadly http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3722206  he had such good ideas ;;
A SKIN FOR MORGANA WITH LEGS OMG!!! I LOVE THAT HAHAHA
I funniest thing in this thread is THE GIANT COOKIE OF FRIENDSHIP!
I tried Gragas twice, but I love the tropical Gragas skin! Seems like it compliments him well, just add some shades and its a winner

Still wondering why Riot *hasn't done Sax Jax yet.*

RIOT.  **SAX.  JAX.**  It practically writes itself!

And Bagpipe Gragas.
Puppy Teemo who drops dog poop everywhere
But... Morg doesn't have any legs.

I love that you're giving some love for us players who love looking at hunky men! Love the ideas for Escort Waiter Mundo, Mr. Universe Nasus, and Manly Taric! I noticed a lot of these have been made in some form or fashion, like Cottontail Teemo, Chosen Master Yi, Huntress Sivir, Reverse Annie, and Frostfire Annie. I've also recognized the Pizza Girl Sivir; It was used as an example for how skins are done at a con I saw pics and videos of. Good work with all  these concepts! Though at current, you can now use Rengar for Cowardly Lion, and Janna for Dorothy.

Dat karrigan akali
Although way too many satan skins.

my KDA man by playing Teemo.
is literally
6.6.6
